name: OUTWORLD PATROL - Moon Level Demo
description:
Outworld Patrol was inspired by on one of the first games I ever played on PC. 

Built in Unreal Engine, the initial goal of the project was for me to expand my knowledge in the engine and to recreate a beloved game motivated by my own nostalgia.

The gameplay I shared received a lot of positive feedback and people wanted to play it so I decided to release the demo I've built for free. 

As every self respecting indie dev, I am working on multiple projects.
If you like the project and you would want to see it expanded please consider supporting it on Kickstarter so that I focus on it first

If you like the demo please consider following me for updates, even if the kickstart fails I will eventually finish this game.

YouTube / Instagram / Twitter/ Twitch
